Text:
Suspect, because you only need to modify this key to .OLD (but doing that causes little troubles... (not in Vista, only troubles with Windows 7...)

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_CLASSES_ROOTlnkfile]

I have a backslash \ between HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT and lnkfile in my regfile.

Dont use this as a regfile

Ok, this is a workaround...
